ai-engineer: AI Systems Engineer with a Master's degree, specializing in the end-to-end MLOps lifecycle of production AI systems. Expertise ranges from designing complex algorithms to architecting scalable backend APIs and CI/CD pipelines for deployment to AWS, GCloud, and on-premise environments
software-engineer: Software Engineer with a Master's degree, specializing in building high-performance, scalable backend systems. Expert in Python, Rust, and TypeScript, with hands-on experience designing REST APIs, microservices, and deploying containerized applications to AWS, GCloud, and on-premise environments.
